title: MTA: MAAP Transit Apparel brings new style to your daily bike commute
content:
For those times you’re not out training or riding gravel, MAAP has a new clothing range to consider. Calling it their first lifestyle collection, in this case, MTA stands for MAAP Transit Apparel. Naturally, that means clothing that is designed to wear for your daily commute, but stylish enough that you won’t want to ditch

The post MTA: MAAP Transit Apparel brings new style to your daily bike commute appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
